duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate CNC lathe machines to produce prototype parts and components.
Collaborate with engineers and designers to understand project requirements and specifications.
Develop CNC programs using CAM software for accurate and efficient machining of prototype parts.
Execute complex machining operations with a high degree of precision, monitoring processes and troubleshooting issues.
Provide feedback to engineering and design teams regarding prototype manufacturability and suggesting improvements.
Adhere to safety protocols and guidelines, ensuring a secure working environment for colleagues.

education_certification.credential: 10+ years of complex setup machining preferred on lathe
